channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Book, Galaxy Book Pro, Galaxy Book Pro 360 and Galaxy Book Odyssey
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Book, Galaxy Book Pro, Galaxy Book Pro 360 and Galaxy Book Odyssey

item.title: CVE-2023-30738|2024-08-02T14:37:14.909Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20book%2C%20galaxy%20book%20pro%2C%20galaxy%20book%20pro%20360%20and%20galaxy%20book%20odyssey
item.description: An improper input validation in UEFI Firmware prior to Firmware update Oct-2023 Release in Galaxy Book, Galaxy Book Pro, Galaxy Book Pro 360 and Galaxy Book Odyssey allows local attacker to execute SMM memory corruption.
